sourcesContent:
import React, {useState, Fragment} from 'react' import './CreateProfile.css' import GooglePlacesAutocomplete from 'react-google-places-autocomplete'; import {connect} from 'react-redux'; import PropTypes from 'prop-types' export const CreateProfile = props => { const [formData,setFormData] = useState({ company:'', website:'', location:'', status:'', skills:'', githubusername:'', bio:'', twitter:'', facebook:'', linkedin:'', youtube:'', instagram:'' }) const { company, website, location, status, skills, githubusername, bio, twitter, facebook, linkedin, youtube, instagram } = setFormData const [displaySocialLinks,toggleBetweenSocial] = useState(false) return (

Create Your Profile

Let's get some information to make your profile stand out

* = required field

Give us an idea of where you are at in your career
Could be your own company or one you are work for
Could be your own or a company website
Choose your location
Please use comma separated values (eg.HTML,CSS,JavaScript,PHP)
If you want share your latest repos, include your username
Tell us a little about yourself
{displaySocialLinks &&
} Go Back
) } CreateProfile.propTypes = { } export default (null)(CreateProfile)
